title: Thunderbird for Android
creator: angharadhughes
content: Hello, I have recently installed Proton Bridge on my desktop computer (Ubuntu Studio) so I can use Thunderbird for my Protonmail Account and my Gmail account - that all seems to work fine. I'm now trying to get Thunderbird for Android to add my Protonmail account - it is fine with my Gmail account. I took a screenshot of the error message which I will attach. I tried both my usual Protonmail password and the one given to me by Proton Bridge, neither work. I have a paid subscription. Thanks for any help anyone can give me!
